Package Services

Class InventoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.InventoryService
  • public class InventoryService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for managing inventory operations. Provides methods to interact with the database and perform CRUD operations on inventory items.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      InventoryService()

      • GetAllInventoryItems

        public java.util.List<InventoryItem> GetAllInventoryItems()
        Retrieves a list of all inventory items.
        Returns:
        A list of inventory items, or an empty list if an error occurs.

        Returns:

      • AddInventoryItem

        public int AddInventoryItem​(java.lang.String itemName,
                            double desiredQuantity,
                            double storedQuantity,
                            java.lang.String unit,
                            java.math.BigDecimal cost)
        Adds a new inventory item to the database.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item.
        desiredQuantity - The desired quantity of the item.
        storedQuantity - The currently stored quantity of the item.
        unit - The unit of measurement for the item.
        cost - The cost per unit of the item.
        Returns:
        1 if successful, 0 if failed, -1 if an error occurs.

      • UpdateInventoryItem

        public int UpdateInventoryItem​(int inventoryItemId,
                               java.lang.String newName,
                               double newDesiredQuantity,
                               double newStoredQuantity,
                               java.lang.String newUnit,
                               java.math.BigDecimal newCost)
        Updates an existing inventory item's details.
        Parameters:
        inventoryItemId - The ID of the inventory item.
        newName - The new name of the item.
        newDesiredQuantity - The new desired quantity of the item.
        newStoredQuantity - The new stored quantity of the item.
        newUnit - The new unit of measurement for the item.
        newCost - The new cost per unit of the item.
        Returns:
        1 if successful, 0 if failed, -1 if an error occurs.

      • DeleteInventoryItem

        public int DeleteInventoryItem​(int inventoryItemId)
        Deletes an inventory item from the database.
        Parameters:
        inventoryItemId - The ID of the inventory item to delete.
        Returns:
        1 if successful, 0 if failed, -1 if an error occurs.
